content: The teachers at Academia always say that no matter how busy life gets, we must stay clear-minded and elegant. This has had an influence on my taste in clothes, yeep~.

content: When sunlight skips through the bookshelves, casting ripples of light, it feels as if time itself is dancing between pages. It carries the mystery that can't be recorded...

content: I believe that the pages of every book are infused with a part of the author's being, conveying their viewpoints, thoughts, imagination, and... answers about the universe.
